title: Thunderbird on Android Mobil Phone
creator: sabine.haluszka-seidel
content:
I'm not happy with the way the mailbox folders are displayed on my mobile phone.

When using numerous subfolders, it is very confusing compared to the display on the PC.


Example:

INBOX.00.AAA


INBOX.01.AAA.aaa

INBOX.01.AAA.bbb

INBOX.01.AAA.zzz


INBOX.02.AAA.aaa

INBOX.02.AAA.bbb

INBOX.02.AAA.zzz


INBOX.99.AAA.aaa

INBOX.99.AAA.bbb

INBOX.99.AAA.zzz


This drives me to despair on the small screen of my mobile phone.


IT WOULD BE BETTER IF THESE HIERARCHY LEVELS WERE REPRESENTED BY INDENTATIONS, AS IS USUALLY THE CASE!


Have I overlooked something, are there settings for this somewhere?


Sabine Haluszka-Seidel

sabine.haluszka-seidel@posteo.de
